name: Sweet Candy Fever Blast
description:
Sweet candy fever blast is quick match 3 candy puzzle game that you can enjoy anytime anywhere.

Candy fever? Sweet candy fever blast is ultimate match 3 candy puzzle game that you can get addicted very quick. Drag line to connect at least 3 identical candies in vertical, horizontal or diagonal way to blast them. More candies you blast, more score you get!

Beat high score, challenge yourself, quick play, Anywhere anytime with this wonderful sweet candy match 3 game.

Sweet Candy Fever Blast Feature:
- Fun and addictive match 3 gameplay
- Gain more time by making blast combo!
- Simple and very easy to play.
- Unique obstacles in very nice and clean colors.
- Icy well-designed UI and cool effects
- Offline support, Play anytime
- All free

Have Sweet candy fever blast in your hands, Enjoy it anywhere off & online.
